title: EP. 136 James McDonald Formerly Addresses Accusations with Receipts
itunes:title: EP. 136 James McDonald Formerly Addresses Accusations with Receipts
description:
This week, James addresses the accusations of him being a confidential informant with Rell from Detroit's Real Whirl Podcast, who took the liberty of researching the paperwork involving this case. Through his own investigation, Rell discovered the authentic case paperwork and identified the case number on the paperwork provided by the accusing party as "invalid". We will let you come to your own conclusions. Here are links to the actual paperwork, which can be verified on www.pacer.uscourts.gov.  

Indictment https://drive.google.com/file/d/1R4Fyge8SOq_rgPGrdFBvIa6Us4RkB7t_/view?usp=sharing  

PleaDeal https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KH6doxnOoSHUuFxB4RCQ7aZNXTIrA_C7/view?usp=sharing

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
This week, James addresses the accusations of him being a confidential informant with Rell from Detroit's Real Whirl Podcast, who took the liberty of researching the paperwork involving this case. Through his own investigation, Rell discovered the authentic case paperwork and identified the case number on the paperwork provided by the accusing party as "invalid". We will let you come to your own conclusions. Here are links to the actual paperwork, which can be verified on www.pacer.uscourts.gov.
